meanings.definition: Give (a surface, especially a fabric or wall covering) a rough or raised texture.
meanings.sent1: She texturized the wall with a special paint to make it rough.
meanings.sent2: The artist texturized the canvas to add depth to the painting.
meanings.sent3: The decorator texturized the curtains to give the room a cozy feel.
meanings.sent4: The sculptor texturized the clay, transforming it into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The chef texturized the frosting to create a visually appealing cake.

meanings.definition: Make (hair) more manageable or give it a particular texture by using a chemical treatment.
meanings.sent1: She texturized her hair to make it easier to style in the morning.
meanings.sent2: The salon offers services to texturize hair for a fresh look.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally texturized his hair with glue instead of gel.
meanings.sent4: The hairstylist texturized her client's hair, giving it a trendy look.
meanings.sent5: The new product promises to texturize hair without damaging it.
